pikachu.name: Pikachu
pikachu.description: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its yellow fur and lightning bolt-shaped tail.

bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
bulbasaur.description: Bulbasaur is a dual-type Pokémon that stores energy in the plant bulb on its back.

charmander.name: Charmander
charmander.description: Charmander has a flame on its tail and is known for its fiery personality.

squirtle.name: Squirtle
squirtle.description: Squirtle is a turtle-like Pokémon that can spray water with high force.

jigglypuff.name: Jigglypuff
jigglypuff.description: Jigglypuff sings lullabies that put enemies to sleep.

meowth.name: Meowth
meowth.description: Meowth loves shiny things and can speak human language in the anime.

psyduck.name: Psyduck
psyduck.description: Psyduck suffers from chronic headaches that unleash mysterious powers.

machop.name: Machop
machop.description: Machop is strong and trains tirelessly to become a fighting master.

geodude.name: Geodude
geodude.description: Geodude is often mistaken for a rock and has great physical defense.

eevee.name: Eevee
eevee.description: Eevee can evolve into many different types depending on environment and items.

snorlax.name: Snorlax
snorlax.description: Snorlax sleeps most of the time but is immensely powerful when awake.

gengar.name: Gengar
gengar.description: Gengar hides in shadows and is known for its mischievous behavior.

alakazam.name: Alakazam
alakazam.description: Alakazam has a very high IQ and uses psychic powers for battle.

mewtwo.name: Mewtwo
mewtwo.description: Mewtwo is a genetically engineered Pokémon with immense psychic power.

mew.name: Mew
mew.description: Mew is said to contain the DNA of every Pokémon, allowing it to learn any move.

dragonite.name: Dragonite
dragonite.description: Dragonite is a kind-hearted dragon that can fly faster than the speed of sound.

magikarp.name: Magikarp
magikarp.description: Magikarp is weak but evolves into the powerful Gyarados.

gyarados.name: Gyarados
gyarados.description: Gyarados is known for its aggressive nature and immense power.

onix.name: Onix
onix.description: Onix is a rock snake Pokémon with immense digging capabilities.

gastly.name: Gastly
gastly.description: Gastly is a ghost made of gas that can pass through solid objects.

haunter.name: Haunter
haunter.description: Haunter hides in shadows and can slip through walls to spook people.

abra.name: Abra
abra.description: Abra teleports away from danger and sleeps 18 hours a day.

rattata.name: Rattata
rattata.description: Rattata is a fast and nimble rodent Pokémon with sharp fangs.

zubat.name: Zubat
zubat.description: Zubat uses echolocation to navigate dark caves.

oddish.name: Oddish
oddish.description: Oddish absorbs moonlight and buries itself in the soil.

growlithe.name: Growlithe
growlithe.description: Growlithe is a loyal fire-type Pokémon often used by police forces.

poliwag.name: Poliwag
poliwag.description: Poliwag has a swirl on its belly that shows its internal organs.

bellsprout.name: Bellsprout
bellsprout.description: Bellsprout uses its flexible body to ensnare prey.

tentacool.name: Tentacool
tentacool.description: Tentacool floats in the sea and stings anything it touches.

sandshrew.name: Sandshrew
sandshrew.description: Sandshrew curls up into a ball to protect itself from enemies.
